content: this pattern can be viewed for free on my blog this no-sew balloon dog is worked as a series of segments from tail to nose it can be worked in any yarn with the appropriate hook for whatever yarn you choose i used #4 medium worsted weight acrylic yarn and a 3 0 mm hook or your preference gauge is not important but make sure all of your yarn is the same weight my dog measures about 12 5 32cm from nose to tail and about 6 5 16 5cm high when assembled
